verbose_text: However, CXCR3 knockdown by siCXCR3 significantly diminished mitochondrial fragmentation, mitochondrial ROS accumulation, mtDNA damage and restored mitochondrial membrane potential and ATP content.
evidence: CXCR3 knockdown by siCXCR3 significantly diminished mitochondrial fragmentation, mitochondrial ROS accumulation, mtDNA damage and restored mitochondrial membrane potential
